basics.name: Paul Gilliam
basics.title: Senior Product Leader
basics.summary: Product leader with expertise across technical development, marketing strategy, and user experience design. Passionate about creating solutions that drive business growth while delighting users. Proven track record of building high-performance product teams and delivering customer-centric features for SaaS platforms, AI-driven solutions, and digital transformation initiatives.

highlights: Led product-led growth initiatives for multiple SaaS platforms, focusing on user acquisition and revenue expansion
Directed AI-driven solutions in retail inventory planning and transportation optimization
Built and managed high-performing product teams using the triad model (product, design, engineering)
Developed comprehensive API strategies enabling third-party integrations and platform expansion
Implemented data-driven decision making processes that improved product performance by 15-30%
Presented to executive teams and boards for organizations with 70,000+ employees
